channel.title: Death emote and wilderness levels
channel.description:
2 questions.
When you die, instead of just getting dced for a moment, see your items listed out in your inventory,
how about the traditional way of dying in runescape, where after you reach 0 hp, you die, like a normal man's death emote, then keep 3 most important items?
Anyone has a tut on that?
Second thing, I'm in need of a tut to keep teleporting from wilderness. Be great if these 2 can be answered.

item.title: Death emote and wilderness levels
item.dc:creator: @tomishere tomishere
item.description:
@tomishere wrote:

And the part where you die? I kinda want the character to bow down before he gets teleported back to home.

Read full topic

item.title: Death emote and wilderness levels
item.dc:creator: @RuneRemix RuneRemix
item.description:
@RuneRemix wrote:

and as for your teleport, go to your void and add !wild() or w.e your wild boolean is…

Read full topic

item.title: Death emote and wilderness levels
item.dc:creator: @_Vengeance _Vengeance
item.description:
@_Vengeance wrote:

Loop through the items and check the values before dropping them.
Store the highest 3 valued items and don’t drop those ones.

Read full topic
